meta.title: DropVox - Transcribe WhatsApp Audio Messages
meta.description: Native macOS app that converts voice messages to text using on-device AI. Works offline, supports 13 languages, Apple Silicon optimized.

hero.title: Transcribe
hero.description: DropVox is a native macOS app that converts voice messages to text using WhisperKit AI. Full app window, menu bar access, and floating drop zone. Works offline, supports 13 languages, and never uploads your audio anywhere.
hero.requirements: Requires macOS 14+ (Sonoma) • Apple Silicon • 75MB-3GB for AI models

preview.recentMessage1: "Hey, can you call me back when..."

features.title: Everything you need
features.description: A complete transcription solution with multiple ways to work: full app window, menu bar, keyboard shortcuts, and drag-and-drop.

localAI.title: WhisperKit AI
localAI.description: Uses WhisperKit optimized for Apple Silicon. Choose from 5 models (75MB-3GB). No internet required after setup.

languages.title: 13 Languages
languages.description: Auto-detect or choose: Portuguese, English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and more.

fullApp.title: Full App Window
fullApp.description: Dashboard with quick actions, history browser with search, and settings. Not just a menu bar app anymore.

clipboard.title: Cmd+V Paste
clipboard.description: Copy audio files in Finder, press Cmd+V in DropVox. Instant transcription with results auto-copied to clipboard.

dropZone.title: Drop Zone
dropZone.description: Floating window for drag-and-drop. Keep it visible while browsing files. Toggle with Cmd+D.

history.title: History Browser
history.description: Full history of all transcriptions with search. View details, copy text, see which model was used.

models.title: Model Selection
models.description: Choose accuracy vs speed: Tiny (75MB, fastest) to Large (3GB, most accurate). Download only what you need.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Your audio never leaves your Mac. No cloud, no accounts, no data collection. Everything runs locally.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Three ways to transcribe your audio files - use whichever fits your workflow.

download.title: Download & Install
download.description: Download the DMG, drag DropVox to Applications. On first run, choose and download an AI model (75MB-3GB).

select.title: Transcribe Your Way
select.description: Use the main window, click the menu bar icon, press Cmd+V to paste, or drag files to the Drop Zone. Supports .opus, .mp3, .m4a, and .wav.

getText.title: Get Your Text
getText.description: Watch real-time progress. Text is automatically copied to clipboard and saved to history. Optionally view results in a floating window.

privacy.title: Your privacy matters
privacy.description: DropVox runs entirely on your Mac. Your audio files are processed locally using WhisperKit, Apple's optimized implementation of Whisper AI. No cloud uploads, no accounts required, no data collection. Ever.

cta.title: Ready to transcribe?
cta.description: Download DropVox and start converting voice messages to text in seconds.

support.title: Find this helpful?
support.description: DropVox is free and open source. If it saves you time transcribing voice messages, consider buying me a coffee.
